nodes.title: Welcome to My Digital Garden
nodes.excerpt: Welcome to my digital garden! This is a place where I cultivate ideas, share knowledge, and document my learning journey.

nodes.title: Digital Garden Philosophy
nodes.excerpt: A digital garden is a different way of thinking about our online writing. It's less performative than a blog, more collaborative than a personal journal.

nodes.title: How to Use Wikilinks
nodes.excerpt: Wikilinks are a powerful way to connect notes in your digital garden. Learn how to use them effectively.

nodes.title: Networked Thought
nodes.excerpt: Networked thought is about connecting ideas rather than keeping them isolated. It's a fundamental concept in digital gardening.

nodes.title: Zettelkasten Method
nodes.excerpt: The Zettelkasten method is a note-taking system created by German sociologist Niklas Luhmann to enhance thinking and writing.

nodes.title: How to Take Smart Notes
